meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Joe Sansonese Michael Edelstein Mark Lowenthal Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #860.

td.p: Joe Sansonese, a writer from Westlake Village, California
Michael Edelstein, an obstetrician and gynecologist from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Mark Lowenthal, a State Department employee from Reston, Virginia (whose 2-day cash winnings total $21,800)

tr.td: SCIENCE
SOCIAL STUDIES
5-LETTER WORDS
MOUNTAINS
PETS
WEREWOLVES

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Mark
Michael
Joe

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Joe] What is Lake...? I can\'t read that. Would you say it for me?)
(Joe: Titicaca.)
(Alex: Oh, Lake Titicaca. No, you had the right idea. You\'re in South, South America and that was good thinking on your part, but it was an incorrect response.)
JoeWhat is Lake Titicaca
$600
MichaelWhat is Lake Victoria?
$2,000
MarkWhat is Lake Victoria?
$5,501
Lake Victoria')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'It has the largest surface area of any lake south of the equator')

tr.td: BODIES OF WATER
It has the largest surface area of any lake south of the equator
Mark
Michael
Joe
3-day champion: $36,801
2nd place: Admiral refrigerator & Emerson 10" television + Jeopardy! box game or Jeopardy! Challenger
3rd place: American Flyer luggage + Jeopardy! box game or Jeopardy! Challenger
Mark
Michael
Joe
